title: Bug - Champion Select
body:
Hello all,


I wanted to report a bug that occured three times this week (out of six game attempts) : 

- When joining the champion select, the client freezes (time goes down to 0 and then nothing moves)
- Nothing is updated excepted for chat messages (I can send and receive them)


This bug is really annoying, not because of the LP loss in ranked, but rather because **leavebuster forbids you to join other games after that** (two bugs and you have to wait for c. 30 mins). 

This started last week, without any parameter change from my side (same programs, same connexion). 

What would you advice me to do? Reinstall the client?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Sounds to me like you might be experiencing an intermittent connection issue on your end/Your ISP's.

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me, let me know if anything helps.
